label.help: In this section you can customize the two background images, the formats supported are .jpg .png for static photos, and .webm for animated videos

imgTopSelect.help: Insert all the images you like, remember that by updating this image you will change the photo that is inside the circle NOW

imgBottomSelect.help: Insert all the images you like, remember that updating this image will change the photo outside the circle NOW

label1.help: In this section you can customize various parameters of the circle, the images will not be affected

circleRadius.help: This parameter changes the size of the circle in pixels.

ghostMode.help: This checkbox allows you to make the image inside the circle semi-transparent, making the subject inside the circle appear as a ghost.

circleColor.help: If you want the inside of the circle to have a color, this is the parameter you need.

circleColorOpacity.help: This parameter allows you to increase or decrease the intensity of the color assigned above.
